evidence.claim: Community Based Care utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company supports HL7 and FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Integration of X12 transaction sets for insurance claims processing is mentioned on their site.
They have a dedicated page discussing security measures, including HIPAA compliance.
Community Based Care uses Azure for backend services.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 EDI in healthcare transactions, indicating a strong fit for API-first integrations.
matched_use_cases: X12 transaction handling for remittance advice
